com.facebook.buck.macho

Class LoadCommandUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • createLoadCommandFromBuffer

        public static LoadCommand createLoadCommandFromBuffer(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                      NulTerminatedCharsetDecoder nulTerminatedCharsetDecoder)
        This is a kind of umbrella method that returns you LoadCommand object depending on the contents of the given bytes array.
        Parameters:
        buffer - Buffer which contains at least values for the LoadCommand fields, positioned at the first byte of the command (cmd field)
        Returns:
        LoadCommandCommonFields that is suitable to handle the given bytes array.

      • enumerateLoadCommandsInFile

        public static void enumerateLoadCommandsInFile(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                               NulTerminatedCharsetDecoder nulTerminatedCharsetDecoder,
                                               Function<LoadCommand,Boolean> callback)
        Enumerates the load commands in the given mach binary which is represented by the buffer by calling the given callback, starting at buffer's position.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer which holds all data.
        callback - The Function object which should be called on each LoadCommand enumeration event. The argument of the function is the LoadCommand object. If Function returns Boolean.TRUE then enumeration will continue; otherwise enumeration will stop and callback will not be called anymore.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • findLoadCommandsWithClass

        public static <T extends LoadCommand> com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<T> findLoadCommandsWithClass(ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                                                           NulTerminatedCharsetDecoder nulTerminatedCharsetDecoder,
                                                                                                           Class<T> type)
        Finds all load commands with the given type in the buffer starting at the buffer's position. Example usage is:

        ImmutableList results = findLoadCommandsWithClass(buffer, MyLoadCommand.class);

        Type Parameters:
        T - Return type of the load command, like SomeLoadCommand.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The buffer which holds all data.
        type - Load command's class, like SomeLoadCommand.class.
        Returns:
        List with all load commands of the given type.
        Throws:
        IOException
